mapper.select: select u.qq from subscription s, user u where s.uid = u.uid and s.fid = #{fid}

select s.type, s.status, s.fid, a.title as name, a.cover as cover from subscription s left join animation a on s.fid = a.media_id where status = 1 and type = 0
and uid = #{uid}

select s.type, s.status, s.fid, b.uname as name, b.avatar as cover from subscription s left join bili_user b on s.fid = b.mid where status = 1 and type = 1
and uid = #{uid}
select count(id) from subscription where status = 1 and uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into subscription (uid, fid, type, mtime, ctime) values (#{uid}, #{fid}, #{type} ,#{mtime}, #{ctime})
